sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This fix script is to revert back to old card experience. 
This script is only for the customers who have upgraded to Utah and want to go to old mobile views.</description>
        <name>Revert to old mobile card exp</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var runManual = false;

if (runManual) {
    changeCardPolarisExperience({
        polarisExperience: false
    });
}

function changeCardPolarisExperience(params) {
  gs.info('Started reverting to old legacy card experience.');
  var mobileCardViewMigrationTools = new sn_hr_integr_fw.MobileCardViewMigrationTools();
    mobileCardViewMigrationTools.retainPolarisExperience(params);
    gs.info('Successfully reverted to old legacy card experience.');
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-11-15 13:04:02</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5400e87f6b03511024ca2421ee44afbd</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Revert to old mobile card exp</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">08ca765153ed5010a86dddeeff7b1277</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">08ca765153ed5010a86dddeeff7b1277</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_5400e87f6b03511024ca2421ee44afbd</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-11-16 18:30:35</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>true</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Revert to old mobile card exp
